author: hyunggi_dsrv
content:
We are testing at `https://kzg-ceremony-sequencer-dev.fly.dev`.
I sent a request for `/contribute` and a 422 error responded.

author: gaohongxiang
content: I've been running it for two or three days straight and today I get an error saying my address has already been contributed. But I don't get to the success page and can't find my contribution. This error stops me when I try to re-enter, what should I do?

author: pietjepuk
content:
If past questions on this are any indication, you are entering the wrong info when searching for your contribution. E.g. you're entering your address when you used Github to sign in.

If you have the receipt of your contribution, others can check as well.

author: gaohongxiang
content: I used my wallet to participate in this ceremony, and I also know that I did not complete the contribution ceremony. Now what I want to do is to re-enter the ceremony, but when I sign, it keeps saying that this wallet has completed the contribution, preventing me from re-entering. I don't know how to solve this problem.
